name: Space is Dicey
description:
Space is Dicey

Use your dice to defeat enemies in this turn-based space battle.
Simply drag a dice input to a card and see what the result will be.

You could deal 6 damage if you use a dice facing to 6 dots.
or maybe even add another dice to your set by taking a chance with a high dice.

I am well aware no sounds have been implemented with the jam version. This is intentional. I rather wanted to get rid of bugs and make sure everythings works well than to add mediocre audio effects into the game last minute
